CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
--[[ local SkillSlots = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DefaultGroup/MobileUI/SkillQuickSlot/SkillSlots").Children local Button_Jump = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DefaultGroup/MobileUI/Button_Jump") local Button_Attack = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DefaultGroup/MobileUI/Button_Attack") local UIJoyStick = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DefaultGroup/MobileUI/UIJoystick") ]]
local MobileUIs = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/ui/DefaultGroup/MobileUI").Children
local SkillSlots = MobileUIs[1].Children[1].Children local UIJoyStick = MobileUIs[2] local Button_Jump = MobileUIs[3] local Button_Attack = MobileUIs[4]
for i, Button in pairs(SkillSlots) do Button:ConnectEvent(ButtonPressedEvent, self.UIPress) end
Button_Jump:ConnectEvent(ButtonPressedEvent, self.UIPress) Button_Attack:ConnectEvent(ButtonPressedEvent, self.UIPress)

wait(0.1) self.IsPressed = false
